items.title: SF redoubles efforts on COVID-19 vaccine equity as data shows widening disparities among children by race and ethnicity
items.summary: Data points to the urgent need for City and community partners to reach children of color in highly impacted neighborhoods.

items.title: 11 Bay Area health officers to lift most indoor mask mandates on Feb. 16
items.summary: Masks still strongly recommended; vaccines and boosters urged to further strengthen defenses.

items.title: SFDPH updates guidance for COVID-19 safety in early childcare settings and youth sports
items.summary: New guidance will minimize disruptions in childcare while keeping children safe; other updates allow children who are up to date on vaccinations to play indoor sports without a mask
